item.title: Signatures
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
This is a collection of quotes that I used for my randomly-generated email signature for around 10 years, before most of my mail usage became web-based. A lot of them are song lyrics I like, IM quotes, video game quotes, etc. Many of them are unsourced (I’ll correct that someday).

I delight in my pain, and I'm shattered like your promises;

Though I try to be sane, I'm just shattered like, shattered like your promises…

Is there a line that I could write

Sad enough to make you cry?

How would you know if you won't give me some time

To see if everything were to work out, you'd be mine

[18:24]<Raquel> hahahahahahaha…ang galing mo talaga mag-joke roy

All the things she keeps inside,

All the things that really matter;

The face puts on its best disguise,

And all is well until the heart betrays…

I believe in fate…but I also believe that a man should have the ability to defy fate and rise above his destiny.

Button for non-service floor does not light up.

I don't mind spending everyday

Out on your corner in the pouring rain

Look for the girl with the broken smile

Ask her if she wants to stay a while

If you were right and I was wrong

Why are you the one who's gone

And I'm still here?

Give me a little credit,

Have in me a little faith;

I wanna be with you forever,

But tomorrow's not too late…

I'll be true, I'll be useful, I'll be cavalier

I'll be yours my dear, and I'll belong to you

If you just let me through…

My heart is yours to fill or burst,

To break or bury, or wear as jewelry,

Whatever you prefer…

Opportunity knocks at the door while temptation leans on the doorbell.

Faith is to believe what you do not see;

the reward for this faith is to see what you believe.

 -- St. Augustine

Everyone has a talent. What is rare is the courage to follow the talent to the dark place where it leads.

Mess with the best, die like the rest…

My worst pains are words I cannot say

Still I will always fight on for you

"and through it all you'd watched me go, you never even cared that I needed you…"

– Dan England & John Ford Coley/ Who's Lonely Now

What the mind of men can conceive and believe,

the mind of man can achieve.

 -- W. Clement Stone

The price for being the best is always having to be the best.

– Nanny Ogg, Lords and Ladies

Try not. Do or do not. There is no try.

 -- Yoda, "The Empire Strikes Back"

Until you find something worth dying for, you're not really living.

 -- Rebecca St. James

Imagination is more important than knowledge.

 -- Albert Einstein

Society often forgives the criminal; it never forgives the dreamer.

What we do in life, echoes through eternity.

 -- Maximus, "Gladiator"

A wise man once said, "I don't know."

2 + 2 = 5 for extremely large values of 2.

My software never has bugs. It just develops random features.

"A good programmer is someone who looks both ways before crossing a one-way street."

"I'm sorry, our software is perfect. The problem must be you.

– Dogbert

All men are equal; it is not birth, but virtue alone, that makes the difference.

  • Voltaire

Experience is the hardest kind of teacher. It gives you the test first, and the lesson afterward.

To sin by silence when they should protest makes cowards out of men.

  • Abraham Lincoln

"The world isn't fair, Calvin."

"I know, but why it isn't ever unfair in my favor?"

  • in "Calvin & Hobbes", by Bill Waterson

Don't walk behind me, I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me, I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.

  • Albert Camus

"640K ought to be enough for anybody." (Bill Gates, 1981)

A friend is someone you call to help you move. A real friend is someone you call to help you move a body.

Defeat is worse than death, because you have to live with defeat.

Foolishness: "When others do a foolish thing, you should tell them it is a foolish thing. They can still continue to do it, but at least the truth is where it needs to be."

"It is difficult to say what is impossible, for yesterday's dream is today's hope and tomorrow's reality."

A human being should be able to change a diaper, plan an invasion, butcher a hog, conn a ship, design a building, write a sonnet, balance accounts, build a wall, set a bone, comfort the dying, take orders, give orders, cooperate, act alone, solve equations, analyze a new problem, pitch manure, program a computer, cook a tasty meal, fight efficiently, die gallantly. Specialization is for insects.

  • Robert Heinlein

My heart is saying "yes", and my mind is saying "whatever, you never listen to me anyway."

"There is no such thing as gravity. The Earth sucks, that is all."

"My destiny is what I make it out to be, not what others want it to be."

"Sometimes I think we're alone in the universe, and sometimes I think we're not. In either case, the idea is quite staggering."

  • Arthur C Clarke

Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up. You build up these defenses, you build this whole suit of armor, so that nothing can hurt you, then one stupid person, no different from any other stupid person, wanders into your stupid life. You give them a piece of you. They didn't ask for it. They do something dumb one day, like kiss you or smile at you, and then your life isn't your own any more. Love takes hostages. It gets inside you. It eats you out and leaves you crying in the darkness, so working its way into your heart. It hurts. Not just in the imagination. not just in the mind. It's a soul-hurt, a body-hurt, a real gets-inside-you-and-rips-you-apart pain. I hate love.

  • Neil Gaiman

The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved - loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.

  • Victor Hugo

I'm the one that has to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life, the way I want to.

  • Jimi Hendrix

When the game is over, the king and the pawn go into the same box.

  • Italian proverb

Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.

  • Ambrose Redmoon

Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.

Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.

  • James Dean

It is not enough to have the courage of your convictions, you must also have the courage to have your convictions challenged.

  • Christopher Phillips

"How much longer are you willing to fight?"

"I'll fight to my last breath, until I reach my limit, until I have nothing more to give."

"So, what's your New Year's resolution?"

"I resolve to live life on purpose, to take control of my fate, to seize each day as if it were my last. I will be reckless. I will be daring. I will be strong. I will challenge fate. I will defy the gods. Or I will die trying."

"…Why can't you just quit smoking or go on a diet like ordinary people?"

"You have been weighed. You have been measured. You have been found wanting."

God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change;

The expense of spirit in a waste of shame

Is lust in action; and till action, lust

Is perjured, murderous, bloody, full of blame,

Savage, extreme, rude, cruel, not to trust;

Enjoyed no sooner but despised straight;

Past reason hunted; and no sooner had,

Past reason hated, as a swallowed bait,

On purpose laid to make the taker mad:

Mad in pursuit, and in possession so;

Had, having, and in quest to have, extreme;

A bliss in proof, and proved, a very woe;

Before, a joy proposed; behind, a dream.

All this the world well knows; yet none knows well

To shun the heaven that leads men to this hell.

Who is the happier man, he who has braved the storm of life and lived or he who has stayed securely on shore and merely existed?

  • Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Tang In Cheek
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
These are quotes (allegedly) made by me, compiled by people I know over the years, supposedly because I am a spout of wisdom (?). (Some of them are just me quoting other things, but the people who compiled this list didn’t get the reference.)

There is also a Twitter bot that randomly tweets one of these per day, if you’re into that sort of thing.

1

Difficult tasks are like drugs: just say ‘No’.

2

it might have been a terrible plan, but sometimes we need to go through the terrible things to make the nonterrible things better

3

On learning how to make code readable: "These are things you must

seek out on your own."

4

"I can choose to pass on the bestness"

5

6

7

why are there always problems?

9

I am an agent of chaos

10

that’s how science works… you think of things then you try it… pag na try mo

na then alam mo na
